metadata.name: Temple Companion
metadata.description: Web application providing daily devotional support for Hare Krishna devotees - mantras, prayers, Ekadasi calendar, and festival dates based on original teachings of Srila Prabhupada

vibe.target_users: Hare Krishna devotees, temple-goers, spiritual practitioners
core_features: Daily mantras and prayers (morning, noon, evening)
Authentic teachings from Srila Prabhupada's books
Offline-first web app for temple use
vibe.inspiration: Based on original Prabhupada teachings - no modifications

status.message: Project initialized. Ready for feature extraction.
